name: EdgeToEdgeWrapper
desc: A wrapper widget that enables edge-to-edge display for its child.

name: EdgeToEdgeWrapper.new
desc: Creates an EdgeToEdgeWrapper.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: AdminHomeScreen
desc: A screen that serves as the main entry point for administrators.

name: AdminHomeScreen.new
desc: Creates an AdminHomeScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: NavigationItem
desc: A data class representing a single navigation item in the Drawer.

name: NavigationItem.new
desc: Creates a NavigationItem.

name: icon
desc: The icon to display for the navigation item.

name: label
desc: The text label for the navigation item.

name: route
desc: The route associated with the navigation item (currently not directly used for navigation).

name: ApiService
desc: A singleton service for making API requests to the backend.

name: ApiService.new
desc: Factory constructor to return the singleton instance.

name: baseURL
desc: The base URL for the API. This is initialized from RemoteConfigService.

name: createBlock
desc: Creates a new block within a hospital.

name: createRole
desc: Creates a new role within a hospital.

name: createShift
desc: Creates a new shift within a hospital.

name: createUser
desc: Creates a new user within a hospital.

name: deleteBlock
desc: Deletes a block from a hospital.

name: deleteRole
desc: Deletes a role from a hospital.

name: deleteShift
desc: Deletes a shift from a hospital.

name: deleteUser
desc: Deletes a user from a hospital.

name: getBlocks
desc: Retrieves a list of blocks for a specific hospital.

name: getHospital
desc: Retrieves details for a specific hospital.

name: getMemos
desc: Retrieves a list of memos for a specific hospital.

name: getRoles
desc: Retrieves a list of roles for a specific hospital.

name: getShifts
desc: Retrieves a list of shifts for a specific hospital.

name: getUser
desc: Retrieves data for a specific user within a hospital.

name: getUsers
desc: Retrieves a list of users for a specific hospital.

name: getWards
desc: Retrieves a list of wards for a specific hospital, optionally filtered by block and floor.

name: initializeBaseURL
desc: Initializes the baseURL from the RemoteConfigService.

name: login
desc: Authenticates a user with a phone number and password.

name: logout
desc: Logs out the current user.

name: refreshUser
desc: Refreshes the current user's data.

name: setPassword
desc: Sets or updates a user's password.

name: switchBlock
desc: Switches the current block for the authenticated user.

name: switchWard
desc:
Switches the current ward for the authenticated user.
newWardId The ID of the ward to switch to.
Returns a Future<bool> which is true if the switch was successful, false otherwise.

name: updateBlock
desc: Updates an existing block's data within a hospital.

name: updateFCMToken
desc: Updates the Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) token for the current user.

name: updateRole
desc: Updates an existing role's data within a hospital.

name: updateShift
desc: Updates an existing shift's data within a hospital.

name: updateUser
desc: Updates an existing user's data within a hospital.

name: AppFontSizes
desc: Defines a set of standard font sizes used throughout the application.

name: AppRadius
desc:
Defines a set of standard border radius values used for widgets
throughout the application.

name: AppSpacing
desc:
Defines a set of standard spacing values used for padding and margins
throughout the application.

name: AppTheme
desc:
Defines the application's theme, including color schemes, text styles,
and widget themes for both light and potentially dark modes.

name: lightTheme
desc: The light theme configuration for the application.

name: AuthProvider
desc: A provider class that manages user authentication state and interactions.

name: clearError
desc: Public method to clear any existing error message.

name: error
desc: Returns the current error message, or null if no error.

name: fetchUserData
desc: Fetches the latest user data from the API.

name: hospital
desc: Returns the hospital associated with the authenticated user.

name: initializeAuth
desc: Initializes the authentication state from shared_preferences.

name: isApprover
desc: Returns true if the current user is an approver.

name: isAuthenticated
desc: Returns true if a user is authenticated (user and token are present), false otherwise.

name: isCreator
desc: Returns true if the current user is a creator.

name: isLoading
desc: Returns true if an asynchronous operation is in progress, false otherwise.

name: isResponder
desc: Returns true if the current user is a responder.

name: isStaff
desc: Returns true if the current user is staff (currently same as superuser).

name: isSuperuser
desc: Returns true if the current user is a superuser.

name: login
desc: Attempts to log in a user with the given phoneNumber and password.

name: logout
desc: Logs out the current user.

name: refreshUser
desc: Refreshes the user's authentication token and data.

name: setPassword
desc: Attempts to set or reset a user's password.

name: token
desc: Returns the authentication token.

name: updateCurrentBlock
desc: Updates the user's currently selected block.

name: updateCurrentWard
desc: Updates the user's currently selected ward.

name: updateFCMToken
desc: Updates the user's FCM (Firebase Cloud Messaging) token.

name: updateUserDirectly
desc: Directly updates the internal user object and notifies listeners.

name: user
desc: Returns the currently authenticated user.

name: parseApiError
desc: Parses a raw API error string to extract a more user-friendly message.

name: AuthResponse
desc: A model representing the authentication response from the API.

name: AuthResponse.fromJson
desc: Creates an AuthResponse instance from a JSON map.

name: AuthResponse.new
desc: Creates an AuthResponse instance.

name: hospital
desc: The hospital associated with the authenticated user.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this AuthResponse instance to a JSON map.

name: token
desc: The authentication token.

name: user
desc: The authenticated user's details.

name: Block
desc: A model representing a block within a hospital.

name: Block.fromJson
desc: Creates a Block instance from a JSON map.

name: Block.new
desc: Creates a Block instance.

name: description
desc: An optional description of the block.

name: hospitalId
desc: The ID of the hospital this block belongs to.

name: id
desc: The unique identifier of the block.

name: name
desc: The name of the block.

name: BlockSelectionScreen
desc: A screen that allows users to select their block within a hospital.

name: BlockSelectionScreen.new
desc: Creates a BlockSelectionScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: fromDashboard
desc:
A flag indicating if the screen was navigated from the dashboard.
If true, pressing "cancel" or successfully updating the block
will return to the dashboard. If false, it will navigate to the
home wrapper or login screen.

name: hospitalId
desc: The ID of the hospital the user belongs to.

name: userId
desc: The ID of the currently logged-in user.

name: DashboardScreen
desc:
A screen that displays the user's dashboard, including personal information,
hospital details, current block/ward, and permissions.

name: DashboardScreen.new
desc: Creates a DashboardScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: getFCMToken
desc: Retrieves the Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) token for the current device.

name: HomeWrapper
desc:
A wrapper widget that handles the initial loading and routing logic
after a user logs in or when the app starts.

name: HomeWrapper.new
desc: Creates a HomeWrapper.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: Hospital
desc: A model representing a hospital.

name: Hospital.fromJson
desc: Creates a Hospital instance from a JSON map.

name: Hospital.new
desc: Creates a Hospital instance.

name: address
desc: The physical address of the hospital.

name: geolocationPoint
desc: The geolocation point of the hospital, typically as a string (e.g., "lat,lon").

name: id
desc: The unique identifier of the hospital.

name: name
desc: The name of the hospital.

name: radius
desc: The operational radius of the hospital in meters.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this Hospital instance to a JSON map.

name: HospitalBlock
desc: A model representing a block within a hospital.

name: HospitalBlock.new
desc: Creates a HospitalBlock instance.

name: hospitalId
desc: The ID of the hospital this block belongs to.

name: id
desc: The unique identifier of the hospital block.

name: name
desc: The name of the hospital block.

name: noOfFloors
desc: The number of floors in the hospital block.

name: HospitalWard.fromJson
desc: Creates a HospitalWard instance from a JSON map.

name: LoginScreen
desc: A screen that allows users to log in to the application.

name: LoginScreen.new
desc: Creates a LoginScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: MainNavigation
desc: A stateful widget that provides the main navigation structure for the application.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: MemoListPage
desc: A Flutter screen that displays a list of memos.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: MemoWebViewPage
desc: A Flutter screen that embeds a web view displaying the Memo Tracking web application.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: initialMemoId
desc: The initial memo ID to load in the web view. If null, the memos list page is loaded.

name: RemoteConfigService.new
desc: Factory constructor to return the singleton instance of RemoteConfigService.

name: getInt
desc: Retrieves an integer value from Remote Config.

name: getString
desc: Retrieves a string value from Remote Config.

name: initialize
desc: Initializes the Remote Config service.

name: SetPasswordScreen
desc: A screen that allows users to set or reset their password.

name: SetPasswordScreen.new
desc: Creates a SetPasswordScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: SimService
desc: A service class to interact with the native SIM information module.

name: getSimNumbers
desc: Retrieves the phone numbers associated with the installed SIM cards.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: BlockSwitchingDialog
desc: A dialog widget for switching the user's current block.

name: BlockSwitchingDialog.new
desc: Creates a BlockSwitchingDialog.

name: apiService
desc: The API service instance for block operations.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: hospitalId
desc: The ID of the hospital.

name: onBlockSelected
desc: Optional callback function invoked after a block is successfully switched.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: WardSwitchingDialog
desc: A dialog widget for switching the user's current ward.

name: WardSwitchingDialog.new
desc: Creates a WardSwitchingDialog.

name: apiService
desc: The API service instance for ward operations.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: hospitalId
desc: The ID of the hospital.

name: onWardSelected
desc: Optional callback function invoked after a ward is successfully switched.

name: showTopToast
desc: Displays a temporary, dismissible toast message at the top of the screen.

name: User
desc: A model representing a user in the system.

name: User.fromJson
desc: Creates a User instance from a JSON map.

name: User.new
desc: Creates a User instance.

name: copyWith
desc: Creates a copy of this User object with the given fields replaced with new values.

name: currentBlockId
desc: The ID of the block the user is currently associated with.

name: currentBlockName
desc: The name of the block the user is currently associated with.

name: currentWardID
desc: The ID of the ward the user is currently associated with.

name: currentWardName
desc: The name of the ward the user is currently associated with.

name: fcmToken
desc: The Firebase Cloud Messaging token for push notifications, if available.

name: fcmTokenUpdatedAt
desc: The timestamp when the FCM token was last updated.

name: floor
desc: The floor the user is currently associated with.

name: hospitalId
desc: The ID of the hospital the user belongs to.

name: id
desc: The unique identifier of the user.

name: institutionId
desc: The ID of the institution the user belongs to.

name: isApprover
desc: A flag indicating if the user has approver permissions.

name: isCreator
desc: A flag indicating if the user has creator permissions.

name: isResponder
desc: A flag indicating if the user has responder permissions.

name: isSuperuser
desc: A flag indicating if the user has superuser permissions.

name: phoneNumber
desc: The phone number of the user.

name: role
desc: The role of the user (e.g., 'admin', 'doctor', 'nurse').

name: roleId
desc: The ID corresponding to the user's role.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this User instance to a JSON map.

name: WardSelectionScreen
desc: A screen that allows users to select a ward.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: hospitalId
desc: The ID of the hospital the user belongs to.

name: userId
desc: The ID of the current user.

name: WelcomePage
desc: A welcome page that serves as the entry point of the application.

name: WelcomePage.new
desc:
Creates a WelcomePage instance.
The key is optional and can be used to control widget replacement.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.
